text: Sir John Francis Jeffries (28 March 1929 - 25 January 2019) was a New Zealand politician and judge. He was a judge on the High Court from 1976 until his retirement in 1992. He was the 14th Deputy Mayor of Wellington City from 1971 to 1974. Jeffries was born in Wellington. He was a member of the Labour Party. Jeffries died on 25 January 2019 in Wellington, aged 89. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:New Zealand judges Category:Politicians from Wellington
title: John Jeffries
